entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
